text: haey yeung ban nenam mnoussa lok aoy thveula champoh aupouk mdeay robsa ke . mdeay robsa ke ban ppoh ke daoy lombak ning ban brasaut ke daoy lombak bamphot . haey kar ppoh ke ning kar chhb bambaw ke ku mean rypel samseb khe . louh nowpel delke thom doeng kdei ning nowpel delke krob ayou seseb chhnam ke ban buongsuong som tha ao mcheasa robsakhnhom. saum trong me tda thveu aoy khnhom cheh doengkoun champoh nie k meat robsa trong del trong ban bratan mk leu roub khnhom ning towleu aupoukamdeay robsakhnhom ning daembi aoy khnhom thveu ampeula troemotrauv del trong penh chetd vea haey saum trong me tda chuoy keloma roub khnhom nowknong vongsaotrakaul robsakhnhom phng . pitabrakd nasa khnhom ban sarphap tosakamhosa champoh trong ( del khnhom ban sang kanlongomk) haey pitabrakd nasa khnhom sthet knong chamnaom anak del braklkhluon champoh trong
